bankAccount.text: Your presence will be our best gift, however, if you want to contribute to this day we provide you with our account number

foodMenu.title: The menu
foodMenu.item1.title: Cocktail
foodMenu.item1.content: Buffet of international cheeses with jams / Gazpacho with octopus taco / Suckling pig with sweet paprika cream / Seafood temptation and piri-piri mayonnaise / Hake ceviche brioche / Spun prawns with hollandaise / Cold scallop and mussel cream / Wine & Beer bar
foodMenu.item2.title: First course
foodMenu.item2.content: Salmon tenderloin with avocado cream and mushrooms
foodMenu.item3.title: Second course
foodMenu.item4.title: Dessert
foodMenu.item4.content: Pumpkin brownie with white conguito ice cream / Almond wedding cake with egg yolk and meringue / Coffee and infusions / Liqueurs and brandy
foodMenu.item5.title: Winery
foodMenu.item5.content: Verdejo white wine and Rioja red wine / Cava Brut / Beers, soft drinks and water
ourStory.title: Our story
ourStory.intro:
A Spaniard and a Belgian

We met in university

Eight years ago and since then we haven't stopped laughing
